Iets Nuuts

Apartments

Iets Nuuts

Elevate your coastal retreat in this inviting two-bedroom house perched on the first floor in charming Hermanus, a small seaside town renowned for its whale watching and swimming spots. With two en suite bathrooms, a well-equipped kitchen, and a spacious living room offering stunning sea views, this residence is designed for comfort and relaxation, accommodating up to four people. Enjoy the convenience of an indoor braai for cozy gatherings.

Olive

Experience coastal tranquility with Olive, a cozy one-bedroom ground-floor apartment in the heart of Hermanus, known for its beautiful beaches and exciting whale watching. This thoughtfully designed space effortlessly combines comfort and convenience, offering a snug bedroom, stylish bathroom, and a seamlessly integrated kitchen and living area filled with natural light.

Pomegranate

Experience coastal living at its finest in Pomegranate, a spacious one-bedroom ground-floor apartment in Hermanus, renowned for its pristine beaches and captivating whale watching. The well-appointed space seamlessly combines comfort and convenience, featuring a cozy bedroom, stylish en suite bathroom, and an integrated kitchen and living area.
